title: What the fuck is going on with demotion ?
body:
I get demoted right after losing 1-2 games at max. What the fuck is going on
Previous season I could play up to 4-5 games at 0 lp. Now I literally fall once I reach 0lp.
It is insane.

replies.body:
They recently changed it so that if you que up at 0LP & lose, you are automatically demoted. This was first seen in Ranked TFT and was applied to other Ranked Queues going forward.

It works in TFT since Promo Series aren't a thing in Ranked TFT. In Solo Queue, it feels like you get severely punished if you lose at 0LP since you'll have to play through Promos again.

it is ridiculous tbh.
Now I am fucking afraid to even play
It depends on your MMR, you get safety padding when playing at a rank well below your MMR.
